price: 174. Dadow! Waxaa  idiinka yimid Xujo Cad xagga Rabbigiin (waa Nabi Muxammad s.c.w), Waxaana idiin soo dirnay Nuur cad (Qur’aanka).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بُرۡهَٰنٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ نُورٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāakum bur'hānun min rabbikum wa-anzalnā ilaykum nūran mubīnan
